askForPasswordDelay.title: Require password delay
askForPasswordDelay.description: Number of seconds to delay before the password will be required to unlock or stop the screen saver (the
). A value of 2147483647 can be used to disable this requirement.

askForPassword.title: Require password to unlock the screen.
askForPassword.description: If true, the user will be prompted for a password when the screensaver is unlocked or stopped.
